short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for checking of OCT, Visual Fields, and Corneal Topography billing codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The aim of this extension is to allow for seamless verification of opthomological ICD-10 codes for billing purposes. The user can choose a procedure code and then verify that the ICD-10 code meets the LCD to allow billing by typing in the ICD-10 code that they wish to use.
